schema.description: This view joins four tables (mast, stko, stas, stpo) from the aecorsoft-prj-dev.CDC_S4 dataset to provide a comprehensive view of Bill of Materials data, including material information, BOM header details, BOM item details, and component information.  The data is at the component level, showing details for each component within each BOM.

description.value: Base Unit of Measure for BOM
Long Text Language (for creation of a change document)

Indicator: Not Displayed in Configuration Editor
Indicator: Not Displayed in Single Level Configuration
